name: myXfacts
tag_list: ex, ex-lover, ex-girlfriend, ex-boyfriend, past-relationship, past-lover
overview: With myXfacts users have the possibility to rate their ex-girlfriend or ex-boyfriend. MyXfacts provides a platform where members have the chance to warn others of their ex if he or she cheated on you. Also members can leave a positive comment about their ex. Curious to know more about your new loves past? Look up your new love on myXfacts and find out if he or she ever cheated in a previous relationship or take the chance to warn others of your ex who once duped you.
